name: suite-n-sour.js
description: NetSuite for Node.js! Implments User Interface, SuiteScript Debugger, Offline Client, Web Store, and SOAP API's with more on the way!

CoffeeScript / Node.js libraries for NetSuite automation. Take SuiteScripting to a whole new level of speed, flexibility, and portablity with Suite'n'Sour! Take better advantage of NetSuite's diverse API offerings, including [S]uiteTalk & Shopping API's, [O]ffline Client, Standard [U]ser Interface API, and general JSON and XML [R]PC support!
